title: Plant traps
creator_credit: ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Shows how the pitcher plant lures insects to its trap, where they drown. The sundew, another carnivorous plant, is shown throughout its life cycle. The enfolding of insects by its leaf tentacles is presented by means of time-lapse photography.
creator_credit_for_label: ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
